onblur - when a user leaves input field
onchange - when the user change the contant of the input field
onfocus - when the use over the mouse or click are used then onfocus will      start 
onselect - select 
onsubmit - submit button
onreset - reset button
onkeydown - click the down 
onkeypass - any key to press it will be triger
onkeyup - leave the button then it will be up
